tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

character.name: Amo Dan
character.description: Amo Dan works in Hyuuga Corporation`s General Affairs department. While he`s just a common salaryman during the day, he`s a born biker that loves riding his Yamaha MT-09 Street Rally motorcycle after work through nighttime Tokyo. On and around R246, he`s known as the Zebra. Source: official site

character.name: Mikage Makina
character.description: Mikage Makina works as a freelance journalist and owns Yamaha MT-07 bike. She`s traced the rumors of Hyuuga Corporation`s secret Marishi Machina project and suspects the black-suited riders have something to do with it. She doesn`t worry much, is slightly tsundere and her mood changes quicker than most. Source: official site

character.name: Hyuuga Koutarou
character.description: Hyuuga Koutarou is a elite young heir and director of Hyuuga Corporation, and supervisor of the Chairman`s Marishi Machina development project. He owns Yamaha MT-09 bike. While he`s always clearheaded, he`s a solitary man who trusts no one. Source: official site

character.name: Torimi Sanae
character.description: Torimi Sanae runs the Genesis Café, a popular hang-out spot for riders in Tokyo, located near Hyuuga Corporation. She raised Dan and understands him well. Watching motorcycle races is her hobby. Source: official site

character.name: Hyuuga Mitsukuni
character.description: Hyuuga Mitsukuni is the founder of Hyuuga Corporation. He`s spent his entire life working to achieve its current economic success. He was strict in raising Koutarou, training him in leadership since he was a boy and grooming him as his successor, and finally appointing him as Project Leader for the new powered suits he`s bet his company`s future on. Source: official site

character.name: Torimi Fuuka
character.description: Torimi Fuuka is Sanae`s second daughter and the poster girl of the Genesis Café. She rides an Yamaha MT-125 because she looks up to Dan. Dan recognized her talent as a rider and she has a suit like his but with different colors. She`s carefree, changes moods quickly and is always spoiled by Sanae and Eika.

character.name: Shippou Ruriko
character.description: Shippou Ruriko is a member of the Machina R&D Center. She is the development engineer and test rider of the Marisihi Machina suit unintentionally worn by Makina. One of Kotaro`s close advisers, she is devoted to supporting him.
